getSectionsCountForRenditionUUID: SELECT COUNT(*) as SECTIONS_COUNT FROM cwb_src_rendition_child JOIN cwb_src_rendition ON (cwb_src_rendition_child.CWB_SRC_RENDITION_UUID = cwb_src_rendition.CWB_SRC_RENDITION_UUID) LEFT OUTER JOIN cwb_src_lock_assoc ON ((cwb_src_rendition.cwb_src_rendition_uuid = cwb_src_lock_assoc.cwb_src_rendition_uuid AND cwb_src_lock_assoc.association_discriminator = 'AssignedRenditionImpl') OR (cwb_src_rendition_child.cwb_src_rendition_childuuid = cwb_src_lock_assoc.cwb_src_rendition_childuuid)) LEFT OUTER JOIN cwb_src_lock ON (cwb_src_lock_assoc.cwb_src_lock_uuid = cwb_src_lock.cwb_src_lock_uuid) LEFT OUTER JOIN userservice on (cwb_src_lock.created_by=userservice.west_employee_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN cwb_src_rend_proc_props ON (cwb_src_rend_proc_props.CWB_SRC_RENDITION_UUID = cwb_src_rendition.CWB_SRC_RENDITION_UUID) LEFT OUTER JOIN cwb_section_proc_props ON (CWB_SECTION_PROC_PROPS.CWB_SECTION_UUID = cwb_src_rendition_child.cwb_src_rendition_childuuid) WHERE cwb_src_rendition_child.child_type = 'SectionImpl' AND cwb_src_rendition.CWB_SRC_RENDITION_UUID IN ('?')
getDeltasCountForRenditionUUID: SELECT COUNT(*) as DELTAS_COUNT FROM cwb_src_rendition_child join cwb_src_rendition on (cwb_src_rendition.cwb_src_rendition_uuid = cwb_src_rendition_child.cwb_src_rendition_uuid) join cwb_src_rend_proc_props on (cwb_src_rendition.cwb_src_rendition_uuid = cwb_src_rend_proc_props.cwb_src_rendition_uuid) join cwb_src_lineage on (cwb_src_rendition.cwb_src_lineage_uuid = cwb_src_lineage.cwb_src_lineage_uuid) join js_content_set on (js_content_set.js_content_set_id = cwb_src_lineage.js_content_set_id) join cwb_section_child on (cwb_src_rendition_child.cwb_src_rendition_childuuid = cwb_section_child.cwb_section_uuid) join cwb_section_proc_props on (cwb_src_rendition_child.cwb_src_rendition_childuuid = cwb_section_proc_props.cwb_section_uuid) join cwb_target_location on (cwb_section_child.cwb_section_child_uuid = cwb_target_location.cwb_delta_uuid) join delta_level on (cwb_section_child.delta_level_id = delta_level.delta_level_id) left outer join cwb_delta_proc_props on (cwb_section_child.cwb_section_child_uuid = cwb_delta_proc_props.cwb_delta_uuid) left outer join delta_action deltaActionFromDelta on (cwb_section_child.delta_action_id = deltaActionFromDelta.action_id) left outer join toc_node on (cwb_target_location.target_node_uuid = toc_node.node_uuid) left outer join delta_action deltaActionFromTL on (cwb_target_location.delta_action_id = deltaActionFromTL.action_id) left outer join text_merge_status on (cwb_target_location.text_merge_status_id = text_merge_status.text_merge_status_id) left outer join cwb_src_lock_assoc on ((cwb_src_rendition.cwb_src_rendition_uuid = cwb_src_lock_assoc.cwb_src_rendition_uuid and cwb_src_lock_assoc.association_discriminator = 'AssignedRenditionImpl') or (cwb_src_rendition_child.cwb_src_rendition_childuuid = cwb_src_lock_assoc.cwb_src_rendition_childuuid and cwb_src_lock_assoc.association_discriminator = 'AssignedSectionImpl') or (cwb_section_child.cwb_section_child_uuid = cwb_src_lock_assoc.cwb_section_child_uuid and cwb_src_lock_assoc.association_discriminator = 'AssignedDeltaImpl') or (cwb_target_location.cwb_target_location_uuid = cwb_src_lock_assoc.cwb_target_location_uuid and cwb_src_lock_assoc.association_discriminator = 'AssignedTargetLocationImpl')) left outer join cwb_src_lock on (cwb_src_lock_assoc.cwb_src_lock_uuid = cwb_src_lock.cwb_src_lock_uuid) left outer join userservice on (cwb_src_lock.created_by = userservice.west_employee_id) WHERE cwb_src_rendition.CWB_SRC_RENDITION_UUID IN ('?')
